name: Oracle Chain
description:
You are an ORACLE, capable of seeing the future through your third eye. You have foreseen the return of DEVILS to the lands, and presented your prophecy to the king. Unfortunately, the king has grown foolish and complacent, and ignored your warning. Guess it's your problem now!

Oracle Chain is a game I made for ChainletterJam, in which I was nominated by the lovely torcado to make a game in 2 weeks based on their entry, ribbit digits. It's a turn-based game where you essentially have to simulate the enemy's actions in your head, and respond appropriately!

PS... there is an unlockable secret if you can get a score of at least 10 ;)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#ChainLetterJam Info!

If nominated, you have two weeks to make a 1 minute game in some way inspired by the game that nominated you. Once finished, put #ChainLetterJam in your game description, a link to the game that nominated you, and then nominate two other devs (if you want to!).

Previous games in this chain:

  1. Wordman Saves the Day by miziziziz
  2. Word Bounce by vimlark
  3. Word Bounce 3D by niborious
  4. Arithmetic Bounce by patrickgh3
  5. Dungeon Bounce by drogen
  6. Ribbit Digits by torcado
  7. Oracle Chain, by me! :)
